MemeDef.label: Preyism
MemeDef.description: We live only to be vored.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->[deity0_name] was the first to love [deity0_possessive] lover enough to offer [deity0_possessive]self to them. By being the very first to commit to this act of ultimate intimacy, [deity0_name] became the first of gods.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->The [deity0_type] [deity0_name] was eaten whole by [deity0_possessive] friends. With [deity0_possessive] divine powers [deity0_possessive] could resurrect from any state of digestion.

intro(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], there was a human named [deity0_name]. After conflicts broke out, [deity0_name] began [deity0_possessive] quest of uniting the fighting neighbours by showing them the joy of being vored, becoming the first [deity0_type].

intro(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], during the [ritualName], [deity0_name] came down into the [altarRoomLabel] to be vored by the cult leader in front of the [memberNamePlural], lending [deity0_possessive] to them.
conflict(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->A [foeLeader] declared that all who willingly let themselves be vored are to be conquered and subjugated, and sent [foeSoldiers] to persecute the [memberNamePlural].

founderJoin(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] was attacked by one of the [foeLeader]'s [foeSoldiers]. [founderName] wounded [foeLeader_objective] with a [place_personalWeapon] and decided to show [foeLeader_possessive] mercy. Finally grasping the infinite wisdom of [founderName]s ways, [foeLeader] converted and started praising [deity0_name].

victory(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->[founderName] led a group of [memberNamePlural] into the occupied [place_powerCenter], convinced the [foeLeader]s soldiers to lay down [foeLeader_possessive] weapons. Watching this display of peaceful prowess, [deity0_name] made [founderName] into the new [foeLeader].

setup(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->[founderName] crashlanded on a distant world. Surrounded by hostile forces, [founder_pronoun] befriended the leaders by massaging their insides and was worshipped for her skills.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->To consecrate their commitment, [founderName] demanded that believers show their devotion to each other by being vored at least once a week.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->The most important lesson to learn as a divine prey:
lesson(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->no act is more divine than giving yourself to those you love
lesson(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->even those that do not follow our ways can be swayed with enough massages from the inside
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->Before we accept new members, we must make sure they understand this.
archistBasis(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->The only explanation for the archotech god-machines strength and virility is that they learned to overtake and control their predators from the inside.
archistFact(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->As the consciousness of an archotech expands, it must grow its substrate by taking over the biomatter of anyone consuming them.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will finish their final phase of growth by being consumed by the last predator, ushering in the end of all.
animistBasis(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->Spirits infuse all objects around us, and we can harmonize with these spirits by acting as prey.
animistFact(tag=meme_RV2_Preyism) ->We can absorb the spirit and grow our own power by being consumed.
